{{Infobox USB Hub |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Aten |model = UH-144 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/10/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Aten_UH-144 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series -->
|usb_ver = 1.0 |conn = Female B |size_class = desktop
|vendor_id = 0451 |device_id = 1446 |vendor_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id2 = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = JYXUH-144
|controller_num = <!-- Number of controllers --> |chip1 = Texas Instruments;TUSB2040; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|pwr_optional = false |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 6 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|ports = 4 |tt = |power_led = |port_led = |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none -->
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |estreldate = 10/1998 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== From a sample production unit... *Text of '''USB HUB''', ''Self-powered Hub'', and UH-144 is on the top of the hub's casing. *Labels of ("GAKD039267 QP" + "MADE IN TAIWAN" (label 1, in designated label box), "#22030582" on another larger label w/ different font) are affixed to the bottom of the casing. *The '''ATEN''' logo and "0PB4-0067-E12" is silkscreened on the left corner of the top of the board. *A date code of '''9839''' (October 1998) is silkscreened in the center of the top of the board. *The following components are in use... **The '''TI''' TUSB2040 (TUSB2040, 89T, CKK4) USB 1.0 hub controller **A '''Sharp''' PQ30RV21 voltage regulator **A '''Hsin Da Precision Co., Ltd. (Hsin Da)''' 946H-1C-5D-F relay **An '''NTK''' 48.000 MHZ crystal **A '''Philips''' 74HC86D Quad 2-input XOR gate **Numerous '''D.S''' branded radial capacitors **<small>and some other stuff</small> *The '''ATEN''' logo and "0PB4-0067-E12" is etched onto the top right corner of the bottom of the board. *A label w/ "7BB9111", "158952KB", and '''KD''' stamped on it (over the text) is affixed to the bottom of the board.
Additional specifications, per '''ATEN''''s manual, follows... *Input power specs: 6VDC, 2A / min. 1A (5 mm OD, 2.1 mm ID) *Dimensions (L x W x H): [[Dimensions::130 mm x 70 mm x 24 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::100 g]]
==Links of Interest== [http://www.maxlan.ru/prod&sol/aten/uh144.pdf Manual on '''maxlan.ru''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
